main event: A bright white light, the size of a small star, was observed streaking across the sky for approximately 15 minutes on June 5, 1964.
interesting points: The object was moving from south west to north east., The duration of the sighting was around 15 minutes., The object was described as a bright white light., There is a possibility that the object was astronomical in nature., No photographic evidence is available from the sighting.
sighted object: a bright white light streaking across the sky
